org.asoem.greyfish.core.agent

Interface SpatialAgent<A extends SpatialAgent<A,C,P,?>,C extends Context<?,A>,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D,AC extends AgentContext<A>>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the concrete type of this agent
    P - the type of the projection
    All Superinterfaces:
    Agent<C>, AgentNode, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Moving<org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Motion2D>, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Projectable<P>, java.lang.Runnable, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.collect.TreeNode<AgentNode>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Basic2DAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSpatialAgent, DefaultBasic2DAgent

    public interface SpatialAgent<A extends SpatialAgent<A,C,P,?>,C extends Context<?,A>,P extends org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Object2D,AC extends AgentContext<A>>
extends Agent<C>, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Moving<org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Motion2D>, org.asoem.greyfish.utils.space.Projectable<P>
    An agent for spatial simulations.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        double distance(double degrees)
        Measure the distance from this agent to the first obstacle in the given direction (in degrees [0, 360))
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in which to measure the distance
        Returns:
        the distance to the first obstacle
        See Also:
        SpatialEnvironment2D.distance(SpatialAgent, double)

      • findNeighbours

        java.lang.Iterable<A> findNeighbours(double radius)
        Find all agent which are located around this agent inside given radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the search
        Returns:
        all agents with distance smaller or equal to radius to this agent
